  • ABOUT

My background in visual arts, front-end development and interaction design has allowed me to have a multifaceted perspective and appreciation for my work in UX/UI design.

I am an inquisitive and self-driven UX/UI Designer who is passionate in promoting social good, non profits, education, and the arts through my design work.

I have over 10 years of experience working in tech which includes the opportunities to design for Samsung, Public Health Agency of Canada, British Columbia's Institute of Technology, Goa Games (a gaming subsidiary of Orange), and many small businesses.

Empathy

Getting to know my clients' and the end-users needs and goals help me to make informed design decisions. Building strong partnerships is crucial to the success of all my projects.

Simplicity

Finding balance and clarity in the products message allows the target audience achieve their intended goal(s).

Intuition

Intuitive design allows the audience to use a product without having to question how it works and makes the product a positive, desirable and enjoyable experience.

When I am offline, you can find me spending time with my wife and daughter, going on a bike ride, craving a bowl of ramen, or reading something design-related.

I am currently available for user experience design, user interface design and front end development projects. If you can, please include any relevant information such as the budget, scope and delivery date. I look forward to hearing from you!

Get in touch!
